headline: Spotlight on Zero Trust: we're fastest and here's the proof
keywords: Speed Week, Speed, Zero Trust, Performance, Network Performance Update, Cloudflare Gateway
description: Cloudflare is the fastest Secure Web Gateway in 42% of testing scenarios, the most of any provider. Cloudflare is 46% faster than Zscaler, 56% faster than Netskope, and 10% faster than Palo Alto for ZTNA, and 64% faster than Zscaler for RBI scenarios
